longBusinessSummary: Spearmint Resources Inc., an exploration stage company, engages in in the identification, acquisition, and exploration of mineral properties in Canada and the United States. The company explores for gold, platinum, lithium, palladium, copper, nickel, cesium, vanadium, and other mineral properties. It holds 100% interests in the McGee Lithium Clay Deposit, Elon Lithium Brine Project that covers an area of approximately 3,164 acres, and Green Clay Lithium Project that covers an area of approximately 2,004 acres located in Clayton Valley, Nevada. The company also holds 100% interest in the Chibougamau vanadium project that covers an area of approximately 6,990 contiguous acres located in the Lac Chibougamau, Quebec; Escape Lake North Platinum Group Metals project covering as area of approximately 4,000 contiguous acres located in Ontario, Canada; and Perron-East Gold project that covers an area of approximately 1,608 acres located in the Abitibi greenstone belt of northwestern Quebec. Spearmint Resources Inc. was formerly known as Indefinitely Capital Corp. and changed its name to Spearmint Resources Inc. in February 2012. The company was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
